serviceprofile.title: Proposed FMN Spiral 4 Directory Data Structure Serviceprofile

description.para: The Directory Data Structure Profile provides standards and guidance in support of the definition of the namespace of a federated mission network on the basis of the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP).

guide.para: The Federated Directory Services shall be able to exchange inetOrgPerson object class with mandatory Common Name (cn) and Surname (sn) attributes. Based on the specific MN requirements, the list of exchanged attributes for particular MN might be extended by SMA during MN planning process.
